info.title: Eventbrite
info.description: Eventbrite is a self-service ticketing platform used to create and discover local events.

get.description: Triggers a flow when an organizer has a new event.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Organizer to trigger on new events.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: The order events should be returned in

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, add an event under the selected Organizer.

get.description: Get a list of organizers for your account.
Trigger a flow when an order changes.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Event to trigger on changed order.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, update the selected Order.

parameters.name: event.description.html
parameters.description: The description on the event page.

parameters.name: event.shareable
parameters.description: If users can share the event on social media.

parameters.name: event.hide_end_date
parameters.description: Whether the end date should be hidden.

parameters.name: event.description.html
parameters.description: The description on the event page.

parameters.name: event.shareable
parameters.description: Set specific capacity (if omitted, sums ticket capacities).

parameters.name: event.hide_end_date
parameters.description: Whether the start date should be hidden.

event.organizer_id__in_query.name: event.organizer_id
event.organizer_id__in_query.description: The ID of the organizer of this event.

event.venue_id__in_query.name: event.venue_id
event.venue_id__in_query.description: A previously-created venue to associate with this event.

event.password__in_query.name: event.password
event.password__in_query.description: Password needed to see the event in unlisted mode.

event.capacity__in_query.name: event.capacity
event.capacity__in_query.description: Set specific capacity (if omitted, sums ticket capacities).

event.invite_only__in_query.name: event.invite_only
event.invite_only__in_query.description: Only invited users can see the event page.

event.online_event__in_query.name: event.online_event
event.online_event__in_query.description: Whether the event is online-only (no venue).

event.listed__in_query.name: event.listed
event.listed__in_query.description: If the event is publicly listed and searchable.

event.hide_start_date__in_query.name: event.hide_start_date
event.hide_start_date__in_query.description: Whether the start date should be hidden.

event.show_remaining__in_query.name: event.show_remaining
event.show_remaining__in_query.description: If the remaining number of tickets is publicly visible on the event page.

venue_id__in_query_v2.name: event.venue_id
venue_id__in_query_v2.description: A previously-created venue to associate with this event.
